t=), officially the '''People's Republic of China''' (

t=; abbr: '''PRC'''), is a country in East Asia. It is the world's most populous country, with a population of more than 1.4 billion. China follows a single standard time offset of UTC+08:00 even though it spans five geographical time zones and borders 14 countries, the second most of any country in the world after Russia. Covering an area of approximately 9.6 million square kilometres (3.7 million mi 2 ), it is the world's third largest country.
